title: Stainless Steel Appliances, BBQ Grills, Glass Backsplash, Grey Quartz
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 689 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Discover a European-inspired lifestyle right in the heart of Texas at Siena Apartments.', 'Located in Southwest Fort Worth, our luxurious apartments feature Spanish-tile roofing, modern interiors and several amenities you won’t find anywhere else.', 'Whether you’re looking for a one-bedroom apartment, two-bedroom or three-bedroom apartment, you’ll find an option to fit your lifestyle at Siena.', 'From the grand clubhouse to the European styling of the apartment building and convenience of extra options like detached garages, the amenities at Siena stand out.', 'Our gated Fort Worth community features a resort-style pool, beautiful landscaping, grilling stations, door-to-door valet trash services, package lockers and more.', 'Fitness aficionados will appreciate both our updated fitness center and jogging trails.', 'Finally, we offer online payments for convenience.', 'Additionally, our apartment community is great for families and pet owners alike.', 'Many of our residents own at least one pet and we’re proud to offer a dog park.', 'Many breeds of cats and dogs are accepted and there can be up to two pets per apartment home.', 'For added peace of mind, there’s an on-site courtesy officer and our maintenance team is always a call away.', 'Experience the best that Fort Worth has to offer.', 'Make Siena Apartments your next home.', 'Features:', 'USB Port, Recessed Entertainment Niche, Wood Style Floors*, Flat White Cabinets, Undermount Sink, Storage Available, 6 inch Baseboards, 9 ft. Ceilings with Crown Molding, Full Size Washer/Dryer*, Stainless Steel Appliances, Ceramic Tile Tub, Grey Quartz, 2 Inch Faux Wood Blinds, Alarm System, Backsplash, Private Backyards*, Glass Backsplash, Brushed Nickel Hardware', 'Community Amenities:', 'Fitness center, Package Lockers, Clubhouse, Dog Park, Door to Door Valet Trash, Gazebo, Closed Circuit Surveillance System, Close to Shopping, Covered Parking, Pet Friendly Community, Mediterranean Style Covered Verandah, BBQ Grills, Jogging/Walking Path, Resort Style Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet friendly, contact for details and restrictions.', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', '2j6UqEuP']
